definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
contrary/opposite/backwards/to go against/to oppose/to betray/to rebel
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The conformational change of the enzyme induced by organic solvents was a dynamic process and was reversible to some extent.
sentences.chinese: 這種構象變化是一動態過程，且具有一定的可逆性。

sentences.english: The administration of radiocontrast media often leads to a reversible form of acute renal failure.
sentences.chinese: 造影劑應用後常可引起可逆性的急性腎功能損害。

sentences.english: These include dynamically induced irreversibility and the strong-field index enhancement.
sentences.chinese: 主要考慮強場折射率增強和動態不可逆性。

sentences.english: These drugs work by reversibly blocking nerve conduction.
sentences.chinese: 這些藥物通過可逆性的阻斷神經傳導起作用。

sentences.english: The long term toxicity test showed that use high dose of TAH for long time can produce reversible nephrotoxicity.
sentences.chinese: 毒性研究表明長期大劑量TAH可引起可逆性腎毒性。

sentences.english: The principle is based on the reversibility of a photochemical reaction accompanied by a change of coloration.
sentences.chinese: 其原理是根據伴隨着染色變化在光化反應中的可逆性。

sentences.english: Vancomycin overdosage can produce reversible renal impairment in preterm neonates.
sentences.chinese: 過量的萬古黴素可引起早產兒可逆性腎損害。

sentences.english: This kind of pathological changes, belong to reversibility category mostly, need not follow regularly visit.
sentences.chinese: 這類病變，大多屬可逆性範疇，無需定期隨訪。

sentences.english: But "to return to the nature" was proved illusory.
sentences.chinese: 但是時間的不可逆性證明了“迴歸自然”的空幻。

sentences.english: The third enabler of accidental complexity is irreversibility.
sentences.chinese: 偶發複雜度的第三個誘因是不可逆性。

sentences.english: This idea of reversibility is critical to understanding quantum computing.
sentences.chinese: 可逆性觀點是理解量子計算的關鍵。

sentences.english: In this paper, we discuss the stationarity and invertibility of a bilinear model.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要討論雙線性時間序列模型的平穩性與可逆性。

definition: slow and patient/chronic (disease)/slow to take effect (e.g. a slow poison)
